data.descriptor: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure
data.caption: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure A
data.news_body:
Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1Name of CompanyMM Forgings Ltd-
2CIN NO.L51102TN1946PLC001473
3 Outstanding borrowing of company as on 31st March / 31st December as applicable (in Rs cr) 737.26
4Highest Credit Rating during the previous FY A1
4aName of the Credit Rating Agency issuing the Credit Rating mentioned in (4)CARE RATINGS LIMITED
5Name of Stock Exchange# in which the fine shall be paid in case of shortfall in the required borrowing under the frameworkBSE


We confirm that we are a Large Corporate as per the applicability criteria given under the SEBI circular SEBI/HO/DDHS/CIR/P/2018/144 dated November 26 2018. No



Name of the Company Secretary: Chandrasekar S
Designation: Company Secretary and Compliance Officer
EmailId: corporate@mmforgings.com
Name of the Chief Financial Officer: R Venkatakrishnan
Designation: Chief Financial Officer
EmailId: venkatakrishnan@mmforgings.com

Date: 26/04/2025

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular beginning F.Y 2022 in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore an entity identified as LC shall provide in its initial disclosure for a financial year the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.

data.caption: Board Approved To Withdraw The Notice Of Postal Ballot.
data.news_body: In continuation to our intimation dated 03 Feb 2025 Smt. Shyamala DIN 10895827 who was appointed as NEID effective 31 March 2025 has communicated today to the Board that she will be unable to accept the position of Independent Director due to her organization not granting approval for this appointment effective 31 March 2025. The Board took note of the same through circular resolution and had decided to withdraw the notice of Postal Ballot dated 03 February 2025 with immediate effect.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: This is to inform that Smt. Shyamala S (DIN 10895827) has today communicated to the Board of Directors that she will be unable to accept the position of Independent Director due to her organization not grating approval for this appointment effective 31 March 2025. The Board took note of the same vide circulation resolution. Consequent to the above the Board has decided to withdraw the said notice of Postal ballot dt. 3 February 2025 as approved by the Board with immediate effect. This is for your information please.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Year Ended 31 March 2022
data.news_body:
In Compliance with Regulation 33 of SEBI ( LODR ) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors at its Meeting held today, 25 May 2022 have
inter alia:
1Approved the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and year ended 31 March 2022 and declared Dividend

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 31 Dec 2021
data.news_body: This is to inform that the Board of Directors, inter alia, approved the un-audited financial results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended 31 December 2021 as recommended by the Audit committee at their respective meeting(s) held today, 07 February 2022.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30 September 2021
data.news_body:
1. Pursuant to Regulation 23 ( 9) of SEBI LODR, we hereby enclose the disclosure of Related Party Transactions, for the half year ended 30 September 2021, drawn in accordance with applicable accounting standards.
2. We request you to take on records.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30 Sept 2021
data.news_body: 1. This is to inform that the Board of Directors, inter alia, approved the un-audited financial results (Standalone & Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30 September 2021 as recommended by the Audit Committee at their respective meeting(s) held today, 08 November 2021.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter Ended  30 June 2021
data.news_body:
This is to inform that the Board of Directors, inter alia, approved the un-audited financial results
(standalone & consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended 30 June 2021 as recommended by the Audit committee at their respective meeting(s) held today, 13 August 2021..
1.1 The copies of the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results along with the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors thereon are enclosed herewith for
your records.

data.caption: Submission Of Disclosure Of Related Party Transaction
data.news_body:
1. Pursuant to Regulation 23 ( 9) of SEBI LODR, we hereby enclose the disclosure of Related Party Transactions, for the half year ended 31 March 2021, drawn in accordance with applicable accounting standards.
2. We request you to take on records.

data.caption: Approved  Financial Results And Declared Dividend
data.news_body:
1, The Board approved the Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and year ended 31 March 2021.
2. The Board declared an interim dividend of 50 % (Rs. 5 per equity share)
